lead_paragraph: The assault was the latest in a series carried out against Shiite places of worship in the country’s east, where most Shiites in the predominately Sunni kingdom live.

byline.contributor: Kareem Fahim contributed reporting from Cairo.

snippet: The assault was the latest in a series carried out against Shiite places of worship in the country’s east, where most Shiites in the predominately Sunni kingdom live.

headline.main: Attack on Mosque in Saudi Arabia Leaves 2 Worshipers Dead
